subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Damian Lillard scored 43 points for the Trail Blazers as they handed the Spurs their second straight defeat in triple overtime, the first time a team has played consecutive triple-overtime games since 1951.
snippet: Damian Lillard scored 43 points for the Trail Blazers as they handed the Spurs their second straight defeat in triple overtime, the first time a team has played consecutive triple-overtime games since 1951.
